I am Bunny
Sheepadoodle
Conversationalist

I'm Bunny, a 1-year-old Sheepadoodle with a little sass and a heart of gold. I like to spend my days playing, eating, and "talking."
People seem to find that last thing pretty exciting, but I don't understand what all the fuss is about. After all, Stella has been doing this for years—she's the one who inspired me to start!

links.title: Einops
opt_einsum — opt_einsum v3.3.0 documentation
links.description:
Optimized einsum can significantly reduce the overall execution time of einsum-like
expressions by optimizing the expressionâs contraction order and dispatching
many operations to canonical BLAS, cuBLAS, or other specialized routines.
Optimized einsum is agnostic to the backend and can handle NumPy, Dask,
PyTorch, Tensorflow, CuPy, Sparse, Theano, JAX, and Autograd arrays as well as
potentially any library which conforms to a standard API.

links.description: System for drilling boreholes into subsurface formations.
